alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rensselaer County through 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Center Brunswick, or 7 miles east of Troy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Berlin, Center Brunswick, Brunswick, Hoosick, Poestenkill, East Poestenkill, Petersburg Junction, Quackenkill, Babcock Lake, Sycaway, Barberville, Tamarack, Petersburg, Haynersville, Ives Corner, Clums Corner, Raymertown, Eagle Mills and Potter Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
